bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Etiological Agent. identical with yi qi 疫氣 , epidemic qi. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry bao yu 鮑魚 quoting Zhou hou bei ji fang 肘後備急方 3: 鮑魚頭燒三指撮 , 小豆七枚 , 合末服之 , 女用豆二七枚 , “Burn the head of bao yu [to ashes to obtain as much as] can be picked up with three fingers. Seven xiao dou . Mix the powders and ingest this. Women use two times seven beans”, writes: 鮑魚頭燒灰方寸匕，合小豆末七枚，米飲服之，令瘟疫氣 不相染也 , “Burn the head of bao yu to ashes. Mix the amount filling a square inch size spoon with powder prepared from seven xiao dou. Ingest with the liquid obtained by boiling rice decoction. This will prevent one from being infected with warmth-illness epidemic qi”.
